Title: France  Remove Lunch Voucher component from Special pay.

Step Action: Pre-Requisite: Associate should belong to France region
Login to Spay 1.0 as Super Admin
Step Expected: Manage Polices tab should be visible

Step Action: Navigate to Manage Policies and verify the list of components
Step Expected: Components such as Referral Bonus-Payout,Joining Bonus-Payout,etc., should be listed

Step Action: Verify SuperAdmin can't able to see the Lunch Voucher component
Step Expected: SuperAdmin should not be able to view the Lunch Voucher component
